message.content:
cs.HC, cs.SI, cs.IR, cs.SD, cs.CL 

The paper focuses on designing a platform that encourages users to explore politically diverse profiles, which involves aspects of human-computer interaction (cs.HC) and social media (cs.SI). The platform uses a recommender algorithm and a visualization-based user interface, which involves information retrieval (cs.IR) and data visualization (cs.SD). The paper also discusses cognitive biases and mechanisms that lead to biased behavior, which involves natural language processing (cs.CL) in understanding how people interact with information.
